summary: This mod adds the Uzumaki clan from Naruto into the game,at the moment it is only the race and its power plus one race unique spell.I plan to add more features later on and sort out a few visual things. with the race.
descriptionHtml:
[i][quote]
The Uzumaki of the Hidden Eddy Village are know for their chakra reserves and powerful sealing Jutsu,as descendents of the Senju bloodline they have the ability to awaken the rinnegan if their DNA is mixed with that of a Uchiha[/quote][/i]
This is my first mod so it is yet to be finished but i hope to improve it as I get more experience with the Creation Kit.

This mod adds the Uzumaki clan from Naruto into the [url=#]game[img]http://cdncache1-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png[/img][/url],at the moment it is only the race and its power plus one race unique spell.I plan to add more features later on and sort out a few visual things with the race.I made this mod to play with the Naruto overhaul mod which can be found [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15699/?]here[/url].
The mod can be played without Naruto overhaul but it add much more immersion into the Naruto [url=#]universe[img]http://cdncache1-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png[/img][/url] than my basic race mod.

[u][b]This Mod requires the Race Compatibility mod found [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24168/?]here[/url].[/b][/u]
author: richardfran
